title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4627.4 - Filing of a statement of appeal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4627.4 - Filing of a statement of appeal

State Regulations

Within 15 days after the filing of the notice of appeal, the party aggrieved shall file with the commission an original and a copy of a
statement of appeal, with an admission or affidavit of service upon the
municipal governing body. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4627.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
